title: [Neuroscience] Mental Fatigue May Involve a Potentially Toxic Chemical Buildup in the Brain - A study has theorized that fatigue after a day's mental effort may be a side effect of the brain reducing control over decision making in an effort to avoid a buildup of glutumate in extracellular spaces

[Cancer] Immune cells acquire genomic scars in a lifetime defending against infection: Research found that the mutations seen in healthy B-cells were largely similar to those seen in cancerous B-cells, suggesting that the development of the cancer arises from the same mutational processes
